channel.title: Pages on Josia's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Josia's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: Hey, My name is Josia Scheytt, 28 years old, living in Germany. I am interested in all things DevOps and Cloud Automation. This blog serves mostly as a small utility to keep track of things I have learned, but also as a way of sharing knowledge. For me this is a vital part of living DevOps.
